recommend_0to10: Got completely lost near the river; couldn't find the objective marker at all.

free_text: The new tutorial prompts were super helpful! Much clearer than my friend's experience with the old version.
Combat felt satisfying once I learned the dodge timing. No issues finding objectives.
Quest marker helped but combat difficulty spike at the bridge was brutal.
UI hints appeared too late. I'd already made the wrong turn before the hint showed up.
Enemy damage felt fair this time. I heard it was worse before.
Smooth experience, loved the world atmosphere and sound design.

recommend_0to10: Fast travel is great once you find it, but I never figured out how to unlock the first shrine.

free_text: Much better balanced than I expected from the early access reviews.
Quest marker was hard to notice in bright areas. Died repeatedly at same enemy encounter.
Still challenging but I felt like I was learning rather than just dying randomly.
Combat felt satisfying. Tutorial stuff was unnecessary for me but didn't get in the way.
Frame-rate dipped during storms but overall very playable.

recommend_0to10: Got lost near the river; map could be way clearer. Gave up after 40 minutes.

free_text: Fast travel system works great. Appreciated the freedom to explore.
Quest marker was hard to notice. Also hit a bug where the door didn't openâ€”had to reload.
Enemy damage felt okay after I upgraded my armor. Tutorial helped a lot.
Combat felt satisfying once I learned the parry timing.
Loved the world atmosphere and sound design. Very polished experience.

recommend_0to10: Got lost immediately after the first area. No idea where to go next.

free_text: Great experience overall. No complaints.
Frame-rate issues during storms. Quest objectives unclear at times.
Quest marker helped me not get lost. Last area was too hard though.
Combat felt satisfying. Good challenge level for experienced players.
Fast travel is great once unlocked. Tutorial was clear.

recommend_0to10: Map is confusing. Couldn't figure out the shrine puzzle. Just wandered around.

free_text: Loved the world atmosphere. Very smooth and polished.
Quest marker barely visible. Died a lot at the canyon section.
Harder than expected but the hints kept me on track. Felt fair.
Great pacing. Combat and exploration both felt rewarding.

recommend_0to10: Console controls felt clunky. PC version might be better? Couldn't complete first area.

free_text: Much better than what my friends described from the beta.
Solid game. A few rough edges but nothing major.
Excellent polish. Combat mechanics are tight.
Hit a game-breaking bug in Task 2 where enemy AI froze. Had to skip that section.
Tutorial was helpful. Still died a lot but felt like I was improving.

recommend_0to10: Navigation is terrible. Spent 30 minutes going in circles.

free_text: Smooth experience. No major issues.
Combat is good. Exploration feels a bit aimless at times.
Near perfect. Would recommend to anyone.
